deity: Esoteric Order Of The Palatine Eye
deity_markdown: [Eritrice](/Deities.aspx?ID=470), [Esoteric Order Of The Palatine Eye](/Deities.aspx?ID=362), [Followers of Fate](/Deities.aspx?ID=322), [Imbrex](/Deities.aspx?ID=454), [Lissala](/Deities.aspx?ID=407), [Narriseminek](/Deities.aspx?ID=544), [Norns](/Deities.aspx?ID=628), [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=290), [Suyuddha](/Deities.aspx?ID=621), [Titivilus](/Deities.aspx?ID=530), [Torag](/Deities.aspx?ID=294)
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Mindlink](/Spells.aspx?ID=1603)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 344 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Eritrice](/Deities.aspx?ID=470), [Esoteric Order Of The Palatine Eye](/Deities.aspx?ID=362), [Followers of Fate](/Deities.aspx?ID=322), [Imbrex](/Deities.aspx?ID=454), [Lissala](/Deities.aspx?ID=407), [Narriseminek](/Deities.aspx?ID=544), [Norns](/Deities.aspx?ID=628), [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=290), [Suyuddha](/Deities.aspx?ID=621), [Titivilus](/Deities.aspx?ID=530), [Torag](/Deities.aspx?ID=294)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You link your mind to the target's mind and mentally impart to that target an amount of information in an instant that could otherwise be communicated in 10 minutes.
